name: Umbrel v0.5.2
notes:
Introducing Umbrel 0.5.2 with Community App Stores, the ability to enable/disable remote Tor access, new live search in the app store, bugfixes and performance improvements.

Anyone can create a community app store for Umbrel and distribute their apps for others or personal use. Docs: github.com/getumbrel/umbrel-community-app-store

If you face any issues while updating, please message us on Telegram: https://t.me/getumbrel
